members.name: The Three Broomsticks
members.desc: Unwind with a pint of Butterbeer and cozy up by the fireplace at The Three Broomsticks pub in Hogsmeade - where magical moments and good company await

members.name: Zonko's Joke Shop
members.desc: Get ready to unleash your mischievous side with a visit to Zonko's Joke Shop - the ultimate destination for magical tricks and laughter.

members.name: Honeydukes Sweet Shop
members.desc: Indulge your sweet tooth with a visit to Honeydukes Sweet Shop, where whimsical treats and sugary delights await - a paradise for every wizard's sweetest cravings.

members.name: Gladrags Wizardwear
members.desc: Step into style and embrace your magical fashion at Gladrags Wizardwear - where elegance meets enchantment in every stitch.

members.name: Owl Post Office
members.desc: Sending messages across magical realms is a breeze at the Owl Post Office in Hogsmeade - your one-stop destination for reliable and speedy deliveries.

members.name: The Hogesmeade Community Outreach Center
members.desc: Join hands with the caring community at The Hogesmeade Community Outreach Center - where we work together to make a positive impact in the wizarding world.

members.name: Dervish and Banges
members.desc: Discover a treasure trove of magical artifacts and accessories at Dervish and Banges - your go-to shop for all your wizarding needs.

members.name: Whispering Willow Herbology Emporium
members.desc: Unlock the secrets of nature's magic at the Whispering Willow Herbology Emporium - where enchanted plants and mystical potions await your exploration.

members.name: The Wands for Witches and Wizards Foundation
members.desc: Empowering every witch and wizard with the perfect wand, The Wands for Witches and Wizards Foundation ensures that magic always finds its rightful match

members.name: Scrivenshaft's Quill Shop
members.desc: Experience the art of writing in its finest form at Scrivenshaft's Quill Shop - where quills of exquisite craftsmanship bring words to life on parchment.

members.name: Madam Puddifoot's Tea Shop
members.desc: Savor enchanting moments over a cup of perfectly brewed tea at Madam Puddifoot's Tea Shop - where love and tranquility intertwine in every sip.
